'''Lori Dungey''' (born [[1957]]) is a Canadian born New Zealand actress. She played [[Mrs Bracegirdle]] in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
